title: Trump May Pose a Test No Special Counsel Can Pass
description: Former President Donald J. Trump’s apparent plan to soon announce his candidacy is challenging Attorney General Merrick B. Garland’s desire to show that the Justice Dept. can operate above partisanship.
dc:creator: Katie Benner
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump during a rally in Latrobe, Penn., on Saturday.
